definitions.definition: any stage in a series of events or in a process of development:
examples: The project is only in its initial phase as yet, but it's looking quite promising.

definitions.definition: a period of strange or difficult behaviour that will stop after a while, especially a period that a young child or person goes through:
examples: When I was in my early teens I went through a phase of only ever wearing black.

definitions.definition: The phases of the moon are the regular changes in its shape as it appears to us on earth.
to introduce something in stages over a particular period of time:
examples: The reduction in armed forces will be phased over the next ten years.
